channel.title: It's mother-truckin Summer
channel.description:
Yes! The one time of the year where Mopman sees his shadow and Krackkid gets a haircut. The one time of year where Silabsoft can go to the beach without getting harassed. The one time of the year where wacking off in the day time is appropriate. The one time of the year where it's okay to sleep in till 3pm. The one time of the year where you're suppose to get caught up but you end up slacking any way. And finally, that one time of the year where you decide to try out Runescape again but then realize you're an adult now and that Runescape is no where near the same game as it used to be.
Anyways. Where I live in the United States, I finished up my final exams this past Wednesday and now I have summer vacation till late September. I'll start up a full time construction job in the next few weeks to pay for my school and apartment, but that's life amIright?
So Moparscape, I ask you this. What are your plans for the upcoming summer? What are you doing starting in the fall?

item.title: It's mother-truckin Summer
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Can’t be that bad… I got kicked out of English my senior year so I couldn’t graduate on time. Had to go to an adult high school for a semester.
And no, the teacher didn’t just say “you can’t come to this class anymore”. The class was taken off my schedule and it was turned into a free period. I didn’t really have a say…

Read full topic

@Yz85Racer wrote:

Damn you people that actually attended in their senior year of high school. I regret that so bad now hahahah

item.title: It's mother-truckin Summer
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

hopefully this will be the summer i decide to be productive with my resolution to actually workout and get a decent build, which i do plan to follow through with since next year will be my senior year of high school.

summary of my upcoming summer:

early morning intense workouts
mid day working odd jobs for people for some fair cash
spending the fair pay getting wasted all night with buds.
vacation to florida with some buds.
bang hot bitches

Read full topic
